statements: DELETE FROM swim_team_roster WHERE name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM swim_team_roster WHERE age < 20 AND name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM swim_team_roster WHERE age > 20 AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
DELETE FROM swim_team_contact_details WHERE parent_phone IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM event WHERE distance > 100 AND style = 'Butterfly';
DELETE FROM coach WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM event WHERE event_name = 'Swim Meet' AND location = 'Community Pool';
